CustomField.formula: IF( Has_JIRA__c = TRUE, IF( OR(JIRA_Status__c = "Closed",JIRA_Status__c = "Resolved",JIRA_Status__c = "Done"), DATETIMEVALUE(LEFT(JIRA_Last_Updated__c ,19))-DATETIMEVALUE(LEFT( JIRA_Created_Date__c ,19)) ,NOW()-DATETIMEVALUE(LEFT( JIRA_Created_Date__c ,19))),-1)
CustomField.label: JIRA Age (Days)
